amendment.description: At the end of division D, before the short title, insert the following: Sec. XX. The amounts otherwise provided by this Act are revised by reducing the amount made available for "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Investigations", and increasing the amount made available for the same account, by $3,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 56 printed in House Report 115-259 to allocate an additional $3 million for post-disaster watershed assessment studies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 192 (Roll no. 425).

action.text: Amendment (A036) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
